references: Three binary classification datasets listed in Table.
are used together in order to simulate non-IID data distribution as Chen
do in the evaluation of LAQ

. Specifically,
The number of features is preprocessed to be equal to the minimal number of features among the total three datasets, and each dataset is uniformly distributed across six clients.
